items.name: doll
items.description: You see a weird looking doll, sitting on a chair in the middle of the room. Perhaps putting it somewhere will reveal the secrets of this house

items.name: lamp
items.description: This lamp is found in this room.

items.name: key 1
items.description: You have found 1 of the 3 keys that lie in this house. Find the other 2 keys to unlock the passage to the cellar and save your friend from the horrors within the house.

items.name: mirror
items.description: This mirror is found in the bedroom. Take a second to look at yourself

items.name: toothbrush
items.description: You found a toothbrush in the bathroom.

items.name: toothpaste
items.description: You found toothpaste in the bathroom.

items.name: key 2
items.description: This key is one of the last to find, hurry to save your friend in time!

items.name: standing fan
items.description: You found a standing fan in the bedroom.

items.name: letter
items.description: We have your friend. To find your friend you must collect items around the house and decide which ones can be used. You can gain xp by exploring new rooms and collecting items. You can use this xp to restore your health and buy weapons. Remember, if you fail, we come for you.

items.name: paper
items.description: To win and help save your friend, you must collect three keys. Search the rooms carefully.

items.name: harry potter
items.description: ''Harry did you put your name in the Goblet of fire???''

items.name: godfather 1
items.description: ''I'm gonna make em an offer he can't refuse''
